title: The Secret of Pooks Wood
description: When twins, Lily and Ollie, are stranded over Christmas at Great Hawkesden Manor with their mother, Stella, they have no idea what will happen when they find an old glass snow globe. Inside it, not only is there a miniature model of the manor house... there is magic. This is a time-shift adventure to be enjoyed by readers of 9 - 12, or beyond... who knows!
author: Helen Laycock
